name: div
features: Delivery : FAST & FREE Shipping on All Orders
FEEL360/FreshTek : Antimicrobial fiber treatment that eliminates odor-causing bacteria & wicks away moisture
Over the Calf Height : Covers the entire lower leg, hitting just below the knee for full coverage
Nylon Blend : Durable fabric with high tensile strength for quick drying & lasting comfort
Medium Cushioning : Provides moderate cushioning throughout the sock for a secure fit & enhanced impact protection
Performance Cushioning : Combines comfort & impact protection for all-day wear
Channeled Air Cushioning : Enhances airflow to keep feet cool & ventilated
Engineered Ankle Protection : Protects ankles from shoe rub & irritation
Seamless Toe Closure : Reduces friction for a smooth, irritation-free fit
Performance Mesh : Maximizes breathability with superior airflow
Fabric Composition : 74% nylon, 17% polyester, 4% combed cotton, 4% elastane
